mapper.select: select * from rollerMeasure where techId = #{techId} and disabled is null
mapper.insert: insert into rollerMeasure ( projectId, techId, projectName, area, rollingScheme, length, high, surfaceWidth, type, installMethod, deductionInfo, number, surfaceMaterial, powerPosition, cover, imgUrl, createName, createTime ) value ( #{projectId}, #{techId}, #{projectName}, #{area}, #{rollingScheme}, #{length}, #{high}, #{surfaceWidth}, '卷帘', #{installMethod}, #{deductionInfo}, #{number}, #{surfaceMaterial}, #{powerPosition}, #{cover}, #{imgUrl}, #{createName}, NOW() )
mapper.delete: update rollerMeasure set disabled = 'false' where id = #{id}
